one.text:
Hi and Wellcome to my place!
My name is Petar Ivanov. I'm from Varna- Bulgaria, and I like programming a lot.
 My job is in a call-center, working for a big ISP. In my free time I do some bodyweight exercises and running.
 I like mostly scripting languages like Python and Javascript, but in this project I used some techniques in HTML and CSS to make this site more friendly. 
 Hope you like it! 
:)
one.name: About Me:
